arts.ttl: Why Spurs keep conceding 'ludicrous' goals - MOTD2
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundit Danny Murphy says Tottenham Hotspur's mentality is wrong in "their defending, their professionalism and their organisation", which "comes from the manager" Ange Postecoglu.

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Cunha impact, Son injury + Bradley impresses
arts.sum: Scout Notes from Wolves 4-2 Tottenham and Liverpool 2-1 West Ham The post FPL notes: Cunha impact, Son injury + Bradley impresses appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: European soccer review: Europa League hopes keeping Ange in Spurs job
arts.sum: Janusz Michalik takes a closer look at Manchester City's run-in and discusses whether or not we will see them playing in the Champions League next season. Since April 13, 2024, one calendar year ago, Spurs have lost 22 Premier League games -- more than anyone else among the teams present in these two seasons.

arts.ttl: Cristian Romero 'Disgraceful' for What he Did After Wolves v Tottenham
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur defender Cristian Romero has been labelled 'disgraceful' after what he was spotted doing immediately after defeat to Wolves.

arts.ttl: Wolves 4-2 Tottenham: Ange Postecoglou's side suffer 17th Premier League defeat after being dismantled by Vitor Pereira's men
arts.sum: MATT BARLOW AT MOLINEUX: Defeat number 17 of Tottenham's shambolic Premier League campaign was one to hammer home something we knew already.

arts.ttl: Points then pints: Wolves boss hits pub with fans
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers coach Vitor Pereira is happy to swap the wine of his native Portugal for the beer of England's Black Country as he celebrates his side's 4-2 home win over Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Ange on having full confidence in Guglielmo Vicario for Thursday's UEFA Europa League quarter-final, second leg against Eintracht Frankfurt...
arts.sum: Ange on getting the players 'out of the headspace they'll be in from today'... Ange on if the players' minds were on Thursday and if that's an 'acceptable excuse'...

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou insists he 'won't be holding anyone to account' after Tottenham's error-strewn damning defeat at Wolves - as defiant manager brushes off mistakes as a 'bit unusual'
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou refused to blame his Tottenham players for the individual errors which littered the heavy defeat at Wolverhampton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: 'Part of the family' - Wolves' remarkable turnaround under Pereira
arts.sum: Wolves' 4-2 defeat of Tottenham was their latest impressive performance under Vitor Pereira, who is guiding them to Premier League safety.

arts.ttl: Tottenham Must Sack Postecoglou Now and Appoint 'Genius' Free-Agent Manager
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou lost yet again for Tottenham in the Premier League and action may have to be taken ahead of next weeks' clash vs Frankfurt
